text: The Lower Guadiana International Bridge (; ) is a bridge that crosses the Chança River connecting southern Spain and Portugal. Since early December 2016 to June 2017 the bridge was closed due to a landslide on the Spanish side of the bridge. ==See also== * Guadiana Roman bridge. * Guadiana International Bridge. * Our Lady of Help Bridge. ==References== Category:International bridges Category:Road bridges in Spain Category:Bridges in Andalusia Category:Portugal–Spain border crossings Category:Guadiana
title: Lower Guadiana International bridge
